chunk:
Shaklee Restore Body Serum

Brand: Shaklee

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Magnolia Officinalis (Houpu Magnolia) Bark Extract, Glycerin, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Copolymer, Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline, Niacinamide, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Linoleic Acid, Squalane, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Oleic Acid, Vitis Rotundifolia (Muscadine Grape) Fruit Extract,

Hydroxyproline, Niacinamide, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Linoleic Acid, Squalane, Hydroxyacetophenone, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Oleic Acid, Vitis Rotundifolia (Muscadine Grape) Fruit Extract, Resveratrol, Carnosine, Tocopherol, Propanediol, Vitis Vinifera (Chardonnay Grape) Seed Extract, Ceramide NP, Heptapeptide-7, Linolenic Acid, Pentylene

Rotundifolia (Muscadine Grape) Fruit Extract, Resveratrol, Carnosine, Tocopherol, Propanediol, Vitis Vinifera (Chardonnay Grape) Seed Extract, Ceramide NP, Heptapeptide-7, Linolenic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Citric Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium

NP, Heptapeptide-7, Linolenic Acid, Pentylene Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Lecithin, Citric Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, [[DISCLOSED FRAGRANCE]]**, Limonene, Linalool. **COMPONENTS: Cedrol, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Peel Oil,

Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Ethylhexylglycerin, [[DISCLOSED FRAGRANCE]]**, Limonene, Linalool. **COMPONENTS: Cedrol, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Peel Oil, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylene Brassylate, Isopropylideneglycerol, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Triethyl

Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Peel Oil, Dipropylene Glycol, Ethylene Brassylate, Isopropylideneglycerol, Juniperus Mexicana Oil, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Triethyl Citrate
Directions: Apply all over clean, dry skin. Allow to dry, then layer with body lotion.
